RainbowR Relaunch notes

Goals

  • make RainbowR like RLadies (welcoming, positive learning)

Best way to serve community

  • LGBTQ+ datasets
  • mentoring and support for new learners
  • international (not geographically focused)
  • support community (feel safe) + allyships
  • all activities online for full participation
  • build links with Python and Julia, Queer in AI

Activities (every 3 months)

  • Hackathons
  • meetup tutorials
  • TidyTuesday like events
  • projects short/long term on LGBTQ issues
  • Slack office hours
  • tutorial on Rpkgs
  • LGBTQ color palette based on pride flags
  • Support meetings + 1:1 counselling
  • Seminars on data/coding ethics & inclusive practices

Blog post ideas

  • steps to get involved
  • guest posts
  • data analyses with LGBTQ+ datasets
  • RainbowR colors = who we are

Dataset driven activism

  • host on GitHub inclusive datasets

  • Kelsey Campbell (Gayta Science) - https://www.gaytascience.com/

  • Twitter API

  • http://www.lgbtdata.com/data.html

  • https://opendata.stackexchange.com/questions/6961/looking-for-open-source-lgbt-datasets

  • https://guides.library.ucla.edu/lgbt/statistics

  • https://libguides.gvsu.edu/c.php?g=108409&p=8294841

  • Gender neutral bathrooms

  • same sex marriage

Contributions

  • an illustrator
  • GitHub maintainer
  • R pkg dev
  • code and datasets
  • inclusive bioinformatic conference
